ResourceHeader.ResourceName: AJ4CO Dual Dipole Array and RadioJOVE receiver system
ResourceHeader.Description:
RadioJOVE Dual Dipole Array and RadioJOVE receiver
   system at the AJ4CO Radio Astronomy Observatory in High Springs, Florida.
This is a 2 element array separated by 20 feet. Each antenna element is 25
feet long. Polarization is linear. The array is aligned to magnetic
north. The RadioJOVE direct conversion receiver has a 7 KHz RF
bandwidth and operates at 20.1 MHz . 
   
   See the Information URL for a link to a document providing
   additional descriptions of the instrument characteristics.

InformationURL.Name: RadioJOVE Spectrograph Users Group
InformationURL.Description: This site provide station diagrams and other reports for the receiver systems at several radio observatories associated with the RadioJOVE project.

InformationURL.Name: AJ4CO Radio Astronomy Publications
InformationURL.Description:
This site provides descriptions of radio receiver
    systems at AJ4CO as well as other radio astronomy-related
    documentation

Instrument.InvestigationName:
RadioJOVE phased Dual Dipole Array and RadioJOVE receiver
  system at AJ4CO
